summary: Adds a unique UNP light armor to your game
descriptionHtml:
So here is my first Armor mod that is actually worth being uploaded! :)

Its for the UNP Body Replacer only.

You can craft it under the iron section and dont be scared when you see the usual iron armor in the preview window i just didnt have the time to make an additional preview mesh(though its very easy if i remeber correctly) :P

Have Fun!

VatiWah was so "kind" to review the armor haha check it out :)

[youtube]APWfBT8m_AM[/youtube]
author: standalone09
